ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did He not find you impoverished and enrich you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did He not find you poor and enrich you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And did He not find you in want, and then enriched you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: And did He not find you in need and make you rich?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And found you in need, so made you prosperous?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He found you poor and made you rich
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And find you in want and make you to be free from want?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did He not find thee needy, and suffice thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did He not find thee destitute and enrich (thee)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did He not find you in want, and make you free from want?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He found thee destitute, so He enriched thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did He not find you needy, and enrich you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He found thee in need, and made thee independent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He found you poor, and made you rich (selfsufficient with selfcontentment, etc.)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did He not find you poor and suffice you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And found you in need, and enriched you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [93:8] And did He not find you needy, poor, and enrich you?, [and] made you content with the spoils and other things which He gave you — in a hadīth [it is stated], ‘Wealth comes not from the proliferation of transient [worldly] goods, but wealth comes from the contentedness of the soul’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And he also said: (Did He not find thee) Muhammad (destitute) poor (and enrich (thee)) with the wealth of Khadijah; and it is also said this means: and made you content with that which He gave you? The Prophet (pbuh) said: "Yes, Gabriel!"
